website_summaries.verdict: This microfiber bed skirt has a great color and is more durable than most.
pros: A quality-made microfiber bed skirt that looks great and has a nice ruffle
This bed skirt is easy to fit and has a 16-inch drop
cons: A few customers found their bed skirts too big

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this item - it looks so perfect on our ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this item - it looks so perfect on our bed! As the instructions read, I ran it through the wash and dryer before putting it on and there are barely any wrinkles! It’s PERFECT! It was a little difficult to put on solo, with my mattress already in place, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: dayboymom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this bed skirt. I was especially shocked at the quality of the material for the price I paid. I recently just redid our master bedroom, it fits great! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our bed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ruffled bed skirt in white since we bought a new bed recently and we did not have one. I really like the look of the ruffled skirt because it looks feminine but classic. This bed skirt looks great and has just the right amount of drape. It's also very soft and washes well. It's perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: There are no slits between the sides and end side of the bed frame. It is one continuous ruffle. So I dont know what kind of frame you can actually use it on. Whether you let the ruffle hang outside of the frame or inside, you need the sides to be separated from the end for proper hang. The frame catches the ruffle in the corners so you have to bunch it up and you lose the end ruffle. Cheap but defective.
customer_reviews.author: ahaynes

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great- except for mystery stains
customer_reviews.text: Upon removing it from the package initially, it seemed great: the material is soft, the white color was spot on, the style was exactly what I was searching for. It looked like it was going to work out well. However, upon closer inspection, I have discovered several mystery stains that I can’t identify. They appear almost rust colored. I would inspect carefully and be sure yours is stain-free before keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: ObiWanCannoli

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfect on my king size bed. my bed is pretty high and I was worried it would not go all the way to the ground but it certainly does. I have washed it it the washer on delicate and put it in the dryer on delicate and it held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ratmouse123

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed by the quality of this bed ruffle considering how inexpensive it was. It hangs nicely (although a little long for the beds I put them on) and what I like most is that the flat surface under the ,actress is made of the exact same fabric as the ruffle, not made of that thin mesh that tears so easily on most of the others. The negative is that I wish it had come with slits on the bottom corners, so I will have to make a cut for it to fit over my rails rather than be bunched up. Time will tell about durability, but looks nice for the price at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color not as noted.
customer_reviews.text: I received the dust ruffle today and it was nice, except the color was not a beige, it was more a soft yellow peach color. Does not match anything I have, but will keep it and try to tea dye it the next time it is removed from my bed. I’m kind of disappointed and I decided I’m not going to buy anything else online if the color may be a matching issue. Otherwise it is a nice dust ruffle for the money, just the color is disappointing. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: CJS&GAS

customer_reviews.title: using with a bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is great quality and perfect but it cannot be used with a bed frame! There are no slits in the corners so it wont lay flat against a foot board. Only buy this if you have not footboard or side rails!
customer_reviews.author: Donkondonots

customer_reviews.title: Pure satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a set of these linens experimentally in January. I found that very feature is highly to my satisfaction - so this is my spare set. My primary goal was ample sides and corners for ease of putting the fitted sheet on the bed and for a enough fabric to tuck under on all sides and pull smooth on top. I am over-the-top pleased with that feature. In addition, the feel is genuinely soft and luxurious and the color is true. I've already recommended them to others who have purchased them and are happy.
customer_reviews.author: anita joy delight

customer_reviews.title: Item Exactly as Described VERY Soft
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as described on line through Amazon. The item arrived quickly. When I opened the package, the first thought was wow this bed skirt is so soft. Pure white, too. I was very pleased. It was wrinkled of course having been packaged and shipped. I put it in my dryer on low heat for a few minutes and it came out wrinkle free. Then when I put it on my queen size bed, it fit perfectly. Excellent all around. Thank you. If the need arises, I will order from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Full-size White .. Just lovely
customer_reviews.text: I received this bed skirt today. It was packed messily in the bag, but in excellent condition, good stitching, very soft, really lovely. But white is not working with my decor, so I will be returning it in favor of the beige. (I'm hoping it is more of an ivory tone than the tannish-beige as pictured) If you are looking for a really nice white bed skirt, and at a very good price, I'm sure you love this one. It fit perfectly on my spare room full-size bed, which is very high from the floor so 16" worked great without dragging on the floor, which I did not want. Looking forward to receiving the beige!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pence

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect on my Queen bed
customer_reviews.text: It fits nice, great quality. Of course I had to iron it, but it's beautiful. It doesn't have the slits for the corners though, so if you have a bed w/posts it will of course bunch around the base. Would recommend if you are just wanting a plain white bed skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have found this sooner on here it was perfect! It is true to color and it fit like a charm I took away one star because it was not wrinkle free LOL but I am still very much happy with this purchase. I also love the fact that it was one color all over and not that stupid white in the middle that looks tacky when it hangs over a bit. it is very much worth the money I'll be ordering another one for my son's bed!
customer_reviews.author: beautyallN1

customer_reviews.title: Great bedskirt!
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt is a great value. It’s exactly as described. It arrived very wrinkled but I didn’t expect it to be wrinkle free. It was still wrinkly after washing and drying but I put it on the bed and it looks great. The ruffles mostly hide the wrinkles. The fabric is soft and not too thin. The flat part of the bedskirt is made out of the same fabric as the ruffle which is very nice. Often that part is made out of flimsy webbed-type stuff. I’m very happy with this bedskirt and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LGT Lilburn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this bed skirt, as it is very nice quality and super soft. A couple reasons why I returned it was because it was a tad too long and I kept tripping on it when getting in/out of bed. It is also difficult to make the bed because the bed skirt gets caught and moves around (but that's normal with all bed skirts). I will say it is a tad wrinkly, but nothing a quick iron can't fix (if you're into ironing your bedding haha). It really is a great item if you can look past the minor issues.
customer_reviews.author: rsmithski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bed skirt. I was a little reluctant due to the microfiber, but though it feels like microfiber the appearance is more like a pinpoint cotton. Hangs beautifully and the corners are rounded as opposed to those annoying corner flaps. I ordered a 16" drop and it falls just above the floor, as it should. It was wrinkled when it arrived, but it took me only 15 minutes to iron and it was very easy to iron. This bed skirt was inexpensive, so I was surprised by the quality. Usually you get what you pay for. In this case I got more. I'm picky and I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to keep even... corner should be cut
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkles all over! The design could use work as this will not work with most bed frames. The packaging was super cheap and ripped immediately. I would return but tossed out packaging and not worth my time.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fool all your friends
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap item (price wise), but it REALLY adds a level of chic to your bedroom. Makes my room feel extra homey and like I'm spending extra attention to decor detail, even though I'm definitely not doing that. Good quality material. Not something I'd cuddle up against, but it spends its life on the floor of my bedroom, so there's no need to spend top dollar for better material. It does its job and it looks nice doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorthygaleofoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I just love these skirts, the value is great as well! I have 4 teens and I just replaced everyone's bedding for spring cleaning and the skirts that came with their comforter sets were horrible, so I ordered 4 of these to replace the cheap ones that came with the sets, and I am so glad I did. These are very well made, long with soft material. They just gave the beds much more of a nice quality look. Colors are exactly as shown. I purchased two grey and two white.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: 12 Inches Too Short
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a bed craft project to be the inexpensive top for a canopy on our king bed. This was 12 inches too short. 12 INCHES, yep in this instance size, ie, length was critical. Even if one was to use it for its intended purpose, it’s still 12 inches too freaking short.
customer_reviews.author: Sister-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bed Ruffle Skirt by Utopia Bedding.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get the bed ruffle skirt. I had priced bed ruffles similar to this and found them to be way out of my price range and really thought these would be cheaply made for the price. Wow, was I surprised. So much better then what I expected. Absolutly love it and would recommend them to anybody. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Dees

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled and cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Based on previous reviews I was expecting more with this product, but this is definitely one of those cases where you get what you pay for. This skirt arrived wrinkled, but I decided I would steam it out and try it anyway. It looked very thin and cheap on my bed compared to my other bedsheets, and I knew my cat would tear them up if I gave her the chance. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ace A.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I like the skirt. It bothers me that there’s no slit on the corners for the skirt to lie flat. My footboard causes it to bunch at the corner. If the sides and front weren’t connected it would fall better. But I’m not gonna change it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H

customer_reviews.title: Decent, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Had two loose strings I had to knot and cut. Came incredibly wrinkled, I had to iron it (which was very tedious due to the pleats.) Steaming wouldn't get the deep creases out. STINKS. Very bad chemical smell, like nothing I've ever experienced! Overall it will still be a decent bedskirt and I'm still going to use it, but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I haven't purchased a bed skirt in a number of years. Upon updating my bedroom space I knew I wanted a refresh but I didn't want to spend a fortune doing it. I read prior reviews and honestly ordered because one reviewer mentioned the coverage material under the mattress was fabric which was fantastic because the price point and color was exactly what I was looking for. This skirt is soft and flows unlike those stiff fabric ones that are held between the matress with a sheet of paper that frays and pulls apart if you wash it or over time. This is actually a soft fabric with easy placement and I'm really glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bonsall

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine- I shove it into the side of my bed frame, anyway. But it looks the way it’s supposed to and fits my queen bed. Nice and white with no stains. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Devin Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to finally choose a product as I wanted to make sure I did my research before. This was because many people have said in their reviews on different products that a white bed skirt is see through. So I took the chance and I bought this one and it fitted my bed well, was not see through one bit. My bed is pretty high up and it was the perfect fit and length. I would recommend this product to anyone as the price is great also.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Shipping took forever though.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a cheap looking bed skirt, thicker so it’s not see through and ready sturdy/durable. Super nice quality.. Love it. Wrinkly as expected when it arrived but just passed a steamer on it and voila! It just took forever to get here.. I live in California and have Prime (It said Prime) but it took like a month and a half to get here. Possibly from Covid, but I ordered before that.. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Winston

customer_reviews.title: A little too thin.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I am satisfied. It is too transparent (see through). The wrinkles have not come out from being in the package. It's already on my bed and I am not going to iron it...too lazy. I am the only one that sees it, so I can live with it!
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: The entire skirt, even the part that goes under the mattress is made of the same material. I was so happy to see this. I hate the ones with the thin material under the mattress, as they tend to rip and never wash well. This looks fabulous, and I would purchase again. I got the white one and am very happy with it. I wanted my bedding to look expensive and classy and this is the perfect addition to my bedding. It does not look or feel cheap. This is not at all like what you would find in a big box store. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: lepew352

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Thin. Sizing not great. Sits off balance and was too big by 2 inches in places. If it's just the look you want, it's ok. Be prepared to re-adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed ruffle
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my king size bed ruffle my box springs measures 78x80x16 - ruffle does not touch floor - love the feel of the material - good weight material and is not thin or see thru - is white - not off white - has a few wrinkles - could toss in dryer with a damp cloth, but I just put it on and over time think they will come out
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to find this bed skirt made of tightly woven fabric, and the top flat part made of the same material, not cheap synthetic material cheaper bedskirts usually have. The fabric is very soft, but can be starched if you are looking for stiffer ruffles.
customer_reviews.author: SFOgal

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two twin dust ruffles and three queen dust ruffles, all in white. They were extremely nice quality for the low price. The nicest thing about them, was that the platform was made of the same soft material, so that they will wash and dry nicely - no paper platform! Very good value! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anselm Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a million of these bed skirts. All had crap reviews. So, I was sceptical when I ordered this one. It's GREAT! The material isn't too thin. It wasn't creased badly. It's the same cotton-like material throughout. Even the part that fits under the mattress. I threw it in the dryer on low heat for a few minutes and the wrinkles came right out. It fits well over the box spring of a queen sized bed.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Stains on my new bedskirt?
customer_reviews.text: It was a great price so I wasn't expecting perfection but it arrived with 3 yellow/orange stains. I was expecting something new, not something used and stained. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisT

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this bed skirt.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It is very soft and hangs nicely on the bed, from the box spring to the floor, so it covers very well. It was wrinkled when I opened it (obviously) so I just threw it in the dryer with a fabric softener sheet. It looks great now. Good buy and very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia P

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The item was very wrinkled when i opened the package! But the quality is better than I expected, and am very pleased in the construction, fabric...which is the same for the platform and the skirt. It is strong,well made...I am very, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: MARIA RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Does the expected job of a bed skirt, and does it well...
customer_reviews.text: Softness rating for a bed skirt?! I suppose someone may come into contact with it when it brushes against the top of their foot, but beyond that I have no concern about its softness 🤣 Wrinkly as all get out, but did the job for my kiddo's bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and MelisaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: no slit for bed corners
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice material, sized just right (full size), but there is no slit to accommodate the bottom corners of the bed. I have a sewing machine, so it was easy to cut and hem, but if you aren't able to do that, it will look bad at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: RUTH

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed skirt! It’s beautiful and well made for an amazing price! The only thing is there aren’t any slits in the corners for the bed frame so it bunches up in the corners! I was contemplating cutting it but I think I’m going to leave it, it doesn’t look too bad! Great value, would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Clean and soft looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. One person can put the bedskirt on the bed by themselves. Then adjust the mattress accordingly. Visually the ruffle had some wrinkles in it even after I washed it. But the flow and softness of the bedskirt is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my king size. Seen other reviews saying "be prepared to iron" but I wasn't worried about it. It's a king size ruffled bed skirt shoved into a small plastic package and shipped - I'm sure it's going to need ironed. Ironing it was fairly easy, didn't take long, and now that it's on my bed it looks amazing! *wrinkle free after ironing of course
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I tossed it in the dryer for 10 minutes on low and I didnt have to iron it at all. It’s a fantastic bed skirt at a great price. Bought the twin in black for my daughter- very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I washed and dried it before putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I washed and dried it before putting it on my bed, it came out perfect. I ordered black and it was a true black, I like the way it is all the same color doesn't have that white stiff material on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is very thin and it doesn’t really wash up nicely. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price - very luxurious feel, ruffle hangs very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I really like exthe texture of the fabric. It’s very luxurious and hangs really nicely. The sizing is perfect for a queen bed. The value for the price far exceeded my expectations! I selected the it basically at the lowest price and thought it would be ‘good enough’ but the quality is really nice! I selected white and it’s very nice white color not creamy at all but not like chintzy sterile white either. It did require a quick ironing but I think that was from the packaging- it seems like it will be wrinkle free once it’s washed. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: CaOutdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: This king size bed skirt is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt is perfect! Love that the entire item is fabric and not like so many others. It’s soft and worth the price! When ready for another color, will definitely
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Really nice dust ruffle
customer_reviews.text: I just put the new dust ruffle on my K bed. It was a bid wrinkled from packaging so I put it in the dryer with a damp towel and ran it on low for about 5 minutes and the wrinkles came out. I really like it and the quality is very good. I like the Utopia products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eakins

customer_reviews.title: hangs beautifully, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased that there was ample fabric and it hangs beautifully. I ironed it when it was first out of the package. It was super smooth, and the wrinkles came right out. Very satisfied with fabric and color. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amby

customer_reviews.title: Black fabric is excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on the black bed skirt is soft and thick, and looks great. I washed and dried it before putting it on the bed, as instructed, and all packing wrinkles came out beautifully. No need to iron, which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: JudithB

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Ruffle skirt came very wrinkle from packaging (2 days ago), but I have since noticed that wrinkles are starting to fall out, and this is a good thing, because I'm really not a fan of a lot of ironing!! I like the fact that material is all fabric not that flimsy material most bed skirts come with. Fits true to size (I got a full) as advertised, no need to order a size larger. I am highly satisfied, and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Fuselier

customer_reviews.title: Always do the right steps for the perfect ending!
customer_reviews.text: After washing, this skirt was wrinkle-free and hung beautifully. I was doubtful that it would be the correct length but it was perfect. The fabric was very soft and pristine white. It absolutely completed the look of the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Was too long to say I order correct size. I have a king size bed and ordered a king. Would step on it getting out of bed. I have a low profile bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Just meh.
customer_reviews.text: It looks super cheap and tacky. Very wrinkly, thin, and no slits to go around the corners of the frame. Although the price was low, I think even that figure was too high for this item. It's really a $1 Store type of item.
customer_reviews.author: fgal

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a small package that had no way to open it withour ripping it. It had a lot of random strings sewn into it, which I had to cut to unfold it. There are a few random white stains on it as well. I bought this just to keep my cats from scratching the box spring. For that purpose, I don't mind the quality. If you plan to use it for it to be seen, consider getting another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay put and gets wrinkled easily. I wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This skirt seems too big. I have a standard twin mattress and box spring, but this hangs over the edge of the box spring and drags on the floor. It doesn't stay put and gets wrinkled easily. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. We have our bed on risers and needed a bed skirt that is longer than most. However, I don’t think it is wrinkle free but that doesn’t really bother me because I don’t really care.
customer_reviews.author: Berkeley C

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my tag and it came in a few days. I did put the wording on front and back and it came out nicely but be advised the size is a bit small. Still a good deal, quick shipping and looks nice so gave it 5 stars. I got a pink one for my Blue Nose Pitt Bull.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Fits king mattress
customer_reviews.text: Though it arrived wrinkled, an ironing fixed that. Color is as expected. Looks good. Fits my king bed well. My main problem is trying to get the darn thing between the box spring and mattress without help. But I managed.
customer_reviews.author: The Godfather

customer_reviews.title: The best bedskirt I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: The best bedskirt I've ever purchased! It has a 16" drop which allows for coverage if your bed is a tad bit higher than average. The fabric which covers the boxspring portion is the same as the fabric on the ruffled portion, which I absolutely love! The price is right and the bedskirt is strong and pretty, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jenice

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The dust ruffle was pure white and lite-weight. It was folded and packaged in plastic which resulted in a few wrinkles, but no big deal. It was well stitched with no loose threads. It skims the floor and hides what is stored under the bed plus makes the bed look pulled together. An easy way to add some class to your bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: klm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I find this superior to what is out there in the "big box" stores. It is a dark charcoal grey, and a good weight fabric(not see-through/hides items under the bed.) All the bed skirts I looked at either had cheap paper-thin non-fabric between the mattresses, or they were three times the price. This has the same quality microfiber but it is ALL microfiber..made of the same material throughout, a big plus! I just steamed out a few wrinkles and it looks great. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ruffle, but check the height of the mattress to the floor!
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and easy. However, it does not go down far enough to cover under my bed. My full size bed is approximately 23" from the floor and I guess I should have ordered a bigger one or something. Good thing you can only see one side of it! But is nice and soft and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Woman

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it , its worth it. You won't be disappointed..promise.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. Very good quality for the money. The part that goes on top of the box spring is material, not that cheap cheese cloth stuff. Wrinkles? Of course there are wrinkles. I just misted with a little water and threw it in the dryer for 10 minutes and it came out perfect. Best dust ruffled I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with this bed skirt. I wanted it for a spare bedroom that doesn't get a lot of use so I didn't want to spend a lot of money. This bed skirt fit the bill. The fabric is wonderfully soft, irons like a dream, and it fits my queen size bed perfectly. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Camara

customer_reviews.title: For $20 I'll keep it but I would not recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this skirt is see through. You can clearly see where the box spring ends and the metal frame begins from the second you step into the room. For $20 I'll keep it but I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Low Price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bedskirt that was easy care. I have 4 dogs and a cat - washing bed linens is a must twice a week. So far it looks great - no pulls and looks freshly ironed right out of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, soft fabric that looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match my apartment and cover up my box storage underneath my bed and it looks great! It's pretty easy to put on and seems to be staying in place well (I haven't changed the sheets yet though). It's important to note that it only hangs down on 3 sides, so if you don't have your bed against the wall, it would look odd.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice Bed Skirt
customer_reviews.text: It's a reasonably priced bed skirt that is soft, looks great with a good color density and hangs well on my full-size bed frame. No real downsides it does what it says on the tin so to speak. As an odd plus side my dog seems to like it a lot and has proceeded to make sure he sheds on it every chance he gets. So I'll rate this product a Corgi/10.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Townzen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bedskirt is lovely. Quick delivery and packaging was not oversized. Wrinkles came out easily with quick wash and dry - no softener. Because of the soft but sturdy fabric I was able to place between the mattress and box spring myself - albeit with a bit of grunting! The hang is perfect and the ruffled fullness is just right. Perfect for hiding under bed storage and the inevitable dust bunnies that reside there.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Balliet

customer_reviews.title: One little issue
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric and I love that it covers the whole box spring and isnt a wrap around... I just wish there was a slit where the footboard meets the rail because it bunches up there and looks funny. I cut a slit but it isnt ideal
customer_reviews.author: TNTdivaMom

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price. Feels good threw in dryer took packaging wrinkles out. Nice and full and all fabric. I was very impressed if the quality. Well worth buying. You won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to cover up my box spring and bed frame. A very good product for the price. It was very wrinkled when it arrived, so it is best to be steamed or ironed. It does slide around in some spots making it seem uneven on my box spring, but I’m happy with the product overall and it’s color looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Practical cheap buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Fits fine and does what it's intended. What can you really say about a bed skirt right?
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, soft bed skirt. It was very wrinkled from the packaging, so I put it through the washer & dryer. That removed most of the wrinkles, but it looks best after an ironing.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Jean

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to hide some storage under my bed and it's fantastic. It seems like it'll last awhile, and it covers everything. I also really like the ruffled for two reasons, 1) I don't have to worry as much about keeping it straight and 2) because I have pets who will be crawling under it and disturbing it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine and fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is pretty, versatile, and works well with my quilted bedspread. It fits perfectly on a queen size box spring with a standard frame. The bed skirts at other retailers are very expensive; they may be big name brands and have heavier material, but nooone looks closely at the bed skirt. It is mainly there to keep from seeing the box spring and help with dust accumulation. This is a great skirt for the price and I am happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Great value and cottony look
customer_reviews.text: I needed to iron the ruffle but once I did it hung beautifully in place. It matched the new sheets I bought and made the bed in my guest room look welcoming. Great value and look
customer_reviews.author: Helen GG

customer_reviews.title: This will not work on a daybed!! 3 sided bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine bed-skirt if you have one of the shorter edges against the wall, but this item doesn't have the skirt part on all four edges. One of the shorter edges of my queen bed skirt was missing entirely and I did not know that it came like that when I purchased this item! Be aware. There is only 3 skirted sides
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good price and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Good value and looks nice. However I am surprised it is advertised as wrinkle-free. I washed and dried it when I got it and I still had to take a half hour to iron it as it was quite wrinkled. But its on the bed now looking good!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Love it after I did a little tweaking!
customer_reviews.text: If you have trouble as I did moving a heavy mattress to put this skirt on, here's my solution—I cut out the middle fabric so about 6 inches remained and then tucked that under our very heavy memory foam mattress and it is GREAT! Cannot bet the uality for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a full white bed skirt and received a dark gray I don’t even know what size it is cause the front of the package says king and the back says it’s full and white. Someone needs to send me a replacement pronto
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a higher four post bed and this helped hide the bins we have storing stuff under it. There is no way it was usable immediately and took laundering and steaming.
customer_reviews.author: AMY L STINE

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bed skirt is amazing especially for the price - well-made and very "rich" feeling. However, I have one suggestion for future buyers. I probably should have paid closer attention to the 15" depth and purchased the queen size instead. Our bed has a head and foot board so sits lower than other king beds. I will now have to run a seam down the center to bring the sides up a bit. Again, this was my fault and has nothing to do with the bed skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Piano 4 Fun

customer_reviews.title: Soft, not see through but needs ironing
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect just what I wanted. The bed skirt was definitely wrinkled but nothing a little heat from the iron couldn’t fix. Very soft material and not see through, which is what I was worried about
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waiting to get a bed skirt for a while because I hated the look of my box spring. See the before and after pictures. I am very satisfied and I will order again for another bed in my house that needs one. It was super easy to put on took about 5 minutes. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! Chic
customer_reviews.text: Pretty! Chic, simply elegant, adds a touch of class to my bedding and really pulls the "look" together. My mattress is quite high -- on a box spring -- so this skirt really helps to cover that, while adding femininity to my bed. The ruffles are not MAJOR - but they are indeed visibe. Soft material. Quality is definitely good, and looks pricier than what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Dentist_chickTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not wrinkly
customer_reviews.text: Out of package-I put this in the dryer on “steam/iron” setting for a few minutes. Then I put it directly on the bed and it looks perfect. Not wrinkled and stays unwrinkled
customer_reviews.author: Paula Dowler

customer_reviews.title: Fine.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. No ruffle around the top which took me by surprise but it was probably in the item description. Inexpensive, but decent item for cost.
customer_reviews.author: a buyer

customer_reviews.title: Sooo soft
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as pictured and its white. Not cream or yellow but white. The fabric is very soft. The only minus was that the ruffles were wrinkled and I had to steam press.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a daybed so it doesn't fit perfectly however, it looks great. The color is true black (not faded) and is made nicely.
customer_reviews.author: cchamp

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in white King size. Great for the price. Definitely not wrinkle free but if it bothers you that much you can just iron it. I didn’t and it still looks nice. Can’t see through it which is also a plus since I have a bunch of things under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Master Collector

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!!! Exactly what I was looking for and the price was right. This was a steal. I actually brought a king size for a queen bed so that the ruffle would hang over and hide items underneath the bed. So I was looking for something that was all black including the middle. This fit the bill and the price was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Great skirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bed skirt for the price. It came very wrinkled, but I threw it in the dryer with a damp towel for about 10 minutes and it came out perfect - no iron required! Bought the white - it's a crisp white - a little think, but well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1972

customer_reviews.title: Has a top to go across box spring and is long enough!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my purpose. It has a full top and hangs long enough to cover the box spring. Inexpensive but came so wrinkled. I put it on anyway to see if it would straighten out. Have to iron but fine.
customer_reviews.author: KC2

customer_reviews.title: I was actually surprised how good the bed skirt was for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product ... I was actually surprised how good the bed skirt was for the price. Since I bought it for a spare bedroom that is seldom used, I was more interested in price than quality ... and I got both!!! Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: JE  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bedskirt!
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt is perfect. Soft and well made. I washed and dried it as directed and then put it on our bed. It fits great. I love the ruffles - it's not too girly, but fits better than a tailored bedskirt. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: LidoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s wonderful quality! I was pleasantly surprised considering the price. It has a nice farm look. Very soft. I plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Bed Ruffle - Dust Ruffle - Easy Fit with 16 Inch Tailored Drop - Hotel Quality, Shrinkage and Fade Resistant (Full, White)
feature_bullets: Full size bed ruffle measuring 54 by 75 inches with a 16 inches drop, ensuring everything under your bed stays hidden
Smooth microfiber fabric is not only soft, comfortable and breathable but also gives a royal look to your bedroom
High tensile strength makes it strong, durable and fade resistant and also, less likely to rip or tear
Soft and nice solid covering piece that lays on the box spring makes it easy to install
Pre-shrunk to protect against any shrinkage after washing; machine wash cold on gentle cycle; do not bleach; tumble dry on low heat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,440 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
